entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:42 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:42 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
